description: This file defines an AuthProvider class that manages user authentication state, including login, register, and logout functionalities, using JWT tokens and notifying listeners on state changes.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: Handles user authentication state, JWT token management, login, registration, and logout processes, and notifies listeners on state changes.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Sets the loading state and notifies listeners.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login by sending credentials to backend and updating authentication state.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with username and password, then logs in if successful.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears authentication tokens and user information, notifying listeners.
